text.div:
Standardized Assessment Tools for Fatigue Related to Chronic Illness

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    61795-1 PROMIS item bank - fatigue - version 1.0
    70726-5 Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue Questionnaire - version 4 (FACIT-F)
    70735-6 Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue Questionnaire -13 items - version 4 (FACIT - fatigue 13)
    77864-7 PROMIS fatigue - version 1.0 Tscore

name: Standardized Assessment Tools for Fatigue Related to Chronic Illness
